name: Rocky Patel Fumas - The Edge - Habano Toro
additionalNotes: The Rocky Patel Fumas offer a bold and spicy cigar experience at a more affordable price. With Honduran tobaccos in the core and a light mixture of mixed filling, you can choose between Nicaraguan Corojo or Honduran Maduro Corojo to enjoy an intense and spicy flavor. These cigars are ideal for those looking for a strong and full cigar to enjoy while working in the garage or the yard, or simply want to savor a touch of spice while relaxing with your feet up.
